questions.question: $$ \text{Initial guess} \quad x1 = 0 \quad and \quad x2 = 1 $$ $$ x3 = x1 - f(x1) × \left(\frac{(x2 - x1)}{(f(x2) - f(x1))}\right) $$ $$\text{equation } =  cos(x)-x × exp(x) $$ $$\text{What is function value of 6th iteration using false position method?}$$

$$ \text{Initial guess} \quad x1 = 0 \quad and \quad x2 = 1 $$ $$ x3 = x1 - f(x1) × \left(\frac{(x2 - x1)}{(f(x2) - f(x1))}\right) $$ $$\text{equation } =  cos(x)-x × exp(x) $$ $$\text{What is root value of 6th iteration using false position method?}$$
